ABOUT_FAMILY: Besonderer Dank geht an die Familie
ESP_DESCRIPTION: Zeigt gefilterte Objekte durch Hindernisse an.
ESP_DRAW_TRACER_DESCRIPTION: Zeigt einen Indikator an, welcher von der Mitte des Bildschirms ausgeht.
ESP_DRAW_NAME_DESCRIPTION: Zeigt den Namen des Objekts an.
ESP_DRAW_DISTANCE_DESCRIPTION: Zeigt die Entfernung zum Objekt an.
ESP_HIDE_COMPLETED_DESCRIPTION: Hide completed puzzles (Elemental monuments, Bloatty Floatty, Electro Seelie, etc.)
ESP_RANGE_DESCRIPTION: Maximale Entfernung zur Erkennung von Objekten
ESP_COLORS_DESCRIPTION: Allows you to enable a general color for Box and Tracer.
MIN_ENTITY_SIZE_DESCRIPTION:
Minimum entity size as measured in-world.
Some entities have either extremely small or no bounds at all.
This parameter helps filter out entities that don't meet this condition.
GACHA_URL_FETCHER_DESCRIPTION: Auto get link when opening Wish History.
EXTRA_HIT_DESCRIPTION:
Deals an extra hit.
May not work on some monsters.
DAMAGE_DESCRIPTION: Damage that will be inflicted when the extra hit is triggered.
CUSTOM_ELEMENT_DESCRIPTION:
Allows you to customize the element type of damage.
This may not work for some characters.
(If you want to completely close this function, you need to reload the scene, e.g. entering the dungeon or re-entering the game)
CRITICAL_CHANCE_DESCRIPTION: Set the chance for critical hits.
RUN_ON_WATER_DESCRIPTION: Allow character to run on water.
FORCE_X_AXIS_DESCRIPTION: The force to apply on X axis.
FORCE_Y_AXIS_DESCRIPTION: The force to apply on Y axis.
MID_AIR_DESCRIPTION: Apply the boost even when in the air.
BLINK_HOTKEY_DESCRIPTION: If set, allows player to do blink by pressing the hotkey.
GOD_MODE_DESCRIPTION: Makes player invincible to all types of a damage.
NO_ATTACK_DAMAGE_DESCRIPTION: Allows you to take no damage from attacks.
NO_MODIFIER_DAMAGE_DESCRIPTION:
Allows you to not take damage from various modifications
(for example: Electric Water, Hot Water, Liquid Phlogiston, etc.).
INFINITE_ENERGY_DESCRIPTION:
Removes energy requirement for elemental bursts.
(Elemental burst icons may appear incomplete, but they are still usable.)
INFINITE_STAMINA_DESCRIPTION: Der Ausdauerbalken nimmt nicht mehr ab.
NO_CLIP_DESCRIPTION:
Disables player collision, and allows to fly in any direction quickly.
To move, use WASD, Space (Go Up), and Shift (Go Down).
NO_CLIP_ANIMATION_DESCRIPTION: Prevents player animations from being played while No Clip is active.
NO_CLIP_SPEED_DESCRIPTION:
Controls No Clip flying speed.
Not recommended to use values greater than 25.0.
NO_CLIP_CAMERA_RELATIVE_DESCRIPTION: Moves relatively to the camera view angle instead of the player's view direction.
NO_CLIP_ALTERNATE_DESCRIPTION:
Allows usage of alternate speed when holding down LeftCtrl key.
Useful if you want to temporarily go faster/slower than the set No Clip speed value.
NO_CLIP_ALTERNATE_SPEED_DESCRIPTION:
Controls Alternate No Clip flying speed.
Not recommended to use values greater than 25.0.
NO_CLIP_MODE_VELOCITY_DESCRIPTION: Uses velocity for flying instead of the position.
NO_CLIP_MODE_FREEFLIGHT_DESCRIPTION: Allows to fly, but doesn't remove collisions.
NO_CLIP_CUSTOM_KEYS_DESCRIPTION: Allows to change the No Clip movement keys.
COOLDOWN_EFFECTS_DESCRIPTION: Allows you to remove the cooldown for various effects.
COOLDOWN_SKILL_DESCRIPTION: Entfernt den Cooldown von Elementar- und Spezialfähigkeiten.
COOLDOWN_SKILL_TIMER_DESCRIPTION:
Modifies cooldown of the elemental skills and bursts.
Values greater than 1.0 will increase the skill cooldown.
COOLDOWN_AVATAR_COMBAT_DESCRIPTION: Removes the combat mode from the avatar.
COOLDOWN_WEAPON_DESCRIPTION: Allows the weapon to be permanently located behind the avatar's back.
COOLDOWN_BOW_CHARGE_DESCRIPTION:
Disables cooldown of the bow charge.
Known issues with Fischl.
COOLDOWN_VEHICLE_SKILL_DESCRIPTION: Disables cooldown of the vehicle skill.
PLAYER_SPEED_DESCRIPTION: Allows to customize player movement speed.
SHOW_STATUS_WINDOW_DESCRIPTION: Shows a window with statements of enabled functions.
MOVE_STATUS_DESCRIPTION: Allows 'Status' window to be moved by dragging it.
SHOW_INFO_WINDOW_DESCRIPTION: Shows a window with various information.
MOVE_INFO_DESCRIPTION: Allows 'Info' window to be moved by dragging it.
MOVE_FPS_DESCRIPTION: Allows 'FPS' window to be moved by dragging it.
INIT_DELAY_DESCRIPTION:
Changes the menu appearance delay.
May cause lags while starting, so try to change this value in case.
MOBILE_MODE_DESCRIPTION:
Makes game use mobile UIs.
(Changes will take effect after a relaunch.)
STARTUP_ARGS_DESCRIPTION:
Starts the game with command line arguments.
(Changes will take effect after a relaunch.)
LIST_UNITY_COMMAND_TITLE: List of Unity command line arguments
FADE_DURATION_DESCRIPTION: Changes duration of the window fade in/out animations.
GUI_SCALE_DESCRIPTION: Changes the size of the elements in the Gui.
DEVELOPER_MODE_DESCRIPTION:
If you are not a developer, then you should not enable this mode.
No one will help you with mastering these functions.
The mode unlocks some categories and features.
CHEST_TELEPORT_DESCRIPTION: Teleports you to the nearest chest.
CHEST_TELEPORT_INFO_DESCRIPTION: Show short info about nearest chest to the info window.
CUSTOM_TELEPORTS_DESCRIPTION:
Enable teleport-through-list functionality.
Usage:
1. Put Checkmark to the teleports you want to teleport using hotkey.
2. Single click the teleport (with checkmark) to select where you want to start.
3. You can now press Next or Previous Hotkey to Teleport through the Checklist.
Initially it will teleport the player to the selection made.
Note: Double click or click the arrow to open teleport details.
CUSTOM_TELEPORTS_INFO_DESCRIPTION: Show short info about teleports to the info window.
TELEPORT_NEXT_DESCRIPTION: Press to teleport next of selected.
TELEPORT_PREVIOUS_DESCRIPTION: Press to teleport previous of selected.
INTERPOLATION_DESCRIPTION: Enable interpolation between teleports when using keybinds.
AUTO_TELEPORT_DESCRIPTION: Enable automatic forward teleporation between teleports.
DELAY_TIME_DESCRIPTION:
Delay (in s) between teleport.
Note: This is not fully tested detection-wise.
Not recommended with low values.
DELETE_CHECKED_DESCRIPTION:
Warning: This will delete the file from the directory and
remove the teleport from the list. It will be lost forever.
MAP_TELEPORT_DESCRIPTION:
Enable teleport-to-mark functionality.
Usage:
1. Open map.
2. Hold [Teleport Key] and click with the LMB anywhere in the map.
Done. You have been teleported to selected location.
Teleport might glitch if teleporting to an extremely high location.
Adjust Override Height accordingly to help avoid.
MAP_TELEPORT_KEY_DESCRIPTION: Key to hold down before clicking on target location.
MAP_TELEPORT_TRANSPORT_DESCRIPTION: Use system default transport position instead of mark absolute position when teleport to building and transport mark.
MAP_TELEPORT_OVERRIDE_DESCRIPTION:
If teleport cannot get ground height of target location,
it will teleport you to the height specified here.
It is recommended to have this value to be at least as high as a mountain.
Otherwise, you may fall through the ground.
OCULI_TELEPORT_DESCRIPTION: Teleports you to the nearest oculi.
OCULI_TELEPORT_INFO_DESCRIPTION: Show short info about nearest oculi to the info window.
QUEST_TELEPORT_DESCRIPTION:
Teleport to QuestPoint.
(Does not work for some Quest Areas)
Press the 'V' key to track the Quest, then press the hotkey to teleport.
CAMERA_FOV_DESCRIPTION: Changes the camera field of view.
CENSORSHIP_DESCRIPTION: Disables the camera censorship fade effect, which shows up when you move camera too close to the player.
WEATHER_CUSTOM_DESCRIPTION:
If you know a weather type that is missing in the list above, you can write its path here.
E.G. Data/Environment/Weather/BigWorld/Weather_ClearSky
FREE_CAMERA_DESCRIPTION: Allows to freely control the camera without any limitations.
GRAPHICS_DESCRIPTION: Allows to customize some rendering features.
HIDE_UI_DESCRIPTION: Blendet das UI vollständig oder teilweise aus.
HIDE_UI_ALL_DESCRIPTION:
Hides all in-game UIs.
When you switch to a different scene (E.G. into Domains), turn off and re-enable this feature.
HIDE_UI_SKILLS_DESCRIPTION:
Hides in-game bottom right elemental skill and ultimate.
When you turn them off, you won't be able to use them.
HIDE_UI_CHAT_DESCRIPTION: Blendet das Chatfenster unten links aus.
HIDE_UI_AR_DESCRIPTION:
Hides in-game AR level notification.
When switching to off, you need to teleport to any point to make the notification disappear.
HIDE_UI_RADAR_DESCRIPTION: Hides in-game radar and top left buttons.
PAIMON_FOLLOW_DESCRIPTION:
To display paimon, turn on the function, open the paimon menu (ESC) and then close it.
If the paimon disappeared after teleportation, do not disable the function, open and close the profile.
PROFILE_FRIENDSHIP_DESCRIPTION: Changes the Characters at maximum Friendship Level visually.
PROFILE_FRIENDSHIP_VALUE_TITLE: Characters at maximum Friendship Level Value
FPS_UNLOCK_DESCRIPTION: Allows the game to run at a framerates greater than 60 FPS.
FPS_LOCK_DESCRIPTION:
Limits game framerate while in the background.
This won't work if the cheat menu is open or if you're in a loading screen.
AUTO_DESTROY_DESCRIPTION: Instantly destroys non-living objects within a range.
AUTO_DESTROY_ORES_DESCRIPTION: Ores and variants, e.g. Electro Crystals, Marrows, etc.
AUTO_DESTROY_SHIELDS_DESCRIPTION: Schilde von Abgrundmagiern, Hili- & Mitachurlen, Schleimen
AUTO_DESTROY_SPECIAL_OBJECTS_DESCRIPTION: Destroy Ancient Rime, Large and Small Rock Piles.
AUTO_DESTROY_SPECIAL_CHESTS_DESCRIPTION: Destroy Chests with Brambles, Frozen, or In Rocks.
AUTO_ACTIVATE_TELEPORT_DELAY_DESCRIPTION: Delay before unlocking the next teleport (in ms).
AUTO_FISH_CATCH_DELAY_DESCRIPTION: Fish will be caught after this delay (in ms).
AUTO_LOOT_ITEMS_DESCRIPTION:
Automatically picks up dropped items.
Note: Using this with custom range and low delay times is extremely risky.
Abuse will definitely merit a ban.

If using with custom range, make sure this is turned on FIRST.
AUTO_LOOT_DISABLE_TITLE: Auto disable when bag is full
AUTO_LOOT_DISABLE_DESCRIPTION: Automatically disables auto pickup when bag is full.
AUTO_LOOT_CUSTOM_RANGE_DESCRIPTION:
Enables custom pickup range.
High values are not recommended, as it is easily detected by the server.

If using with auto-pickup/auto-treasure, turn this on LAST.
AUTO_LOOT_CUSTOM_RANGE_VALUE_DESCRIPTION: Modifies pickup/open range to this value (in meters).
AUTO_LOOT_SPEED_DESCRIPTION:
Delay (in milliseconds) between loot/open actions.
Values under 200 MS are unsafe.
Not used if no auto-functions are on.
AUTO_LOOT_DELAY_FLUCTUATION_DESCRIPTION:
Enables delay fluctuation.
Simulates human clicking delay as manual clickling never consistent.
AUTO_LOOT_ADDITIONAL_DELAY_RANGE_DESCRIP: Delay randomly fluctuates between 'Delay Time'+'Delay Time+range'
AUTO_LOOT_TREASURES_DESCRIPTION:
Automatically opens chests and other treasures.
Note: Using this with custom range and low delay times is extremely risky.
Abuse will definitely merit a ban.

If using with custom range, make sure this is turned on FIRST.
AUTO_LOOT_RESOURCES_DESCRIPTION: Everythings beside Animals and Drop Items (Plants, Books, etc.).
AUTO_SEELIE_DESCRIPTION: Auto follow seelie to its home.
AUTO_ELECTRO_SEELIE_DESCRIPTION:
Since you don't need to manually start electro seelie,
they start moving automatically with this option within 100 m radius.
AUTO_TALK_DESCRIPTION:
Automatically goes through the dialogues.
May break some game mechanics.
SKIP_DELAY_DESCRIPTION: Dialogues will be skipped with a delay.
SELECT_LAST_DIALOG_DESCRIPTION: Auto Select Dialog will select last dialog instead of the first one.
RECONNECT_DESCRIPTION:
Allows you to reconnect to the game.
May help if the dialogue freezes.
CLAIM_ACHIEVEMENTS_DESCRIPTION: Ability to claim all achievement rewards by clicking on any of them.
DUMB_ENEMIES_DESCRIPTION:
Enemies won't attack or use their abilities against the player.
May not work with some enemies or enemy abilities.
ELEMENTAL_SIGHT_DESCRIPTION: Elementarsicht bleibt auch während man sich bewegt aktiv.
FAST_COMBINE_DESCRIPTION: Allows you to quickly create an item.
KILL_AURA_DESCRIPTION: Kills all enemies in the set radius.
DAMAGE_MODE_DESCRIPTION: Causes crash damage for the monsters around you.
PERCENT_MODE_DESCRIPTION: Crash damage value scales on a set percent.
KILL_TIMES_DESCRIPTION: How many times kill aura needs to trigger in order to kill the enemies.
KILL_AURA_ONLY_TARGETED_DESCRIPTION: If enabled, kill aura will only affect monsters that are targeting/aggressive towards you.
CRASH_ATTACK_DELAY_DESCRIPTION: Delay (in ms) before next crash damage.
CRASH_REPEAT_DELAY_DESCRIPTION: Delay (in milliseconds) before crash damaging the same monster.
INSTANT_DEATH_MODE_DESCRIPTION:
Kill aura will attempt to instagib any valid target.
Can get buggy with some monsters.
MOB_VACUUM_DESCRIPTION: Vacuums all enemies in the radius to a specified spot in front of the player.
MOB_VACUUM_DROP_DESCRIPTION: Animals you need to kill before collecting.
MOB_VACUUM_NPC_DESCRIPTION: Include animals without mechanics in the vacuum.
MOB_VACUUM_COLLIDER_DESCRIPTION: If enabled, monsters won't be able to push you despite of a distance or size.
MOB_VACUUM_ONLY_TARGET_DESCRIPTION: If enabled, vacuum will only affect monsters targeting you. Will not affect animals.
MOB_VACUUM_SPEED_DESCRIPTION: If 'Instant Vacuum' is not checked, enemy will be vacuumed at the specified speed.
MUSIC_GAME_DESCRIPTION: It is intended only for a music game.
MUSIC_GAME_NO_MISS_DESCRIPTION: It does not count missed clicks.
MUSIC_GAME_HIT_DESCRIPTION: The number of points per tap.
MUSIC_GAME_COMBO_DESCRIPTION: Legt die Kombo während des Spielens fest.
SKIP_CUTSCENE_DESCRIPTION:
Überspringt Cutscenes.
Kann zu Abstürzen oder Spielfehlern führen.
HOTKEY_MODE_DESCRIPTION: The feature will be enabled while holding the hotkey.
